metadata.title: Man killed, two other receive injuries in road accident

content.article_body: VEHARI, Sep 29 (APP):An old man on Monday died while two other persons injured as a mini truck hit a car near Village, 531 EB. The Rescue 1122 spokesman said that a man namely Ahmed's car collided with mini truck and as a result, he injured critically while a woman received minor injuries. The Rescue 1122 team shifted the body and the injured to a nearby hospital, he added. The Truck drive managed to escape form the scene from the successfully. The Machiwal Police registered a case and launched search operation.
